primary.request: Check for resorts in Virginia near Massanutten
primary.context: Caller wants to know if Vacatia has properties near a specific location for a friend
primary.detail: Agent identified available Virginia resorts and provided distance information to the requested location.

secondary.request: Trade week via RCI for Massanutten
secondary.context: Since Vacatia has no resorts in that specific city, caller wants to use RCI exchange
secondary.detail: Agent explained RCI process and sent a link to the RCI help page via text.

steps: Caller asked for resorts in Virginia near 'Mass Nugget' (Massanutten).
Agent performed account lookup and verification.
Agent clarified the location name and provided a list of Williamsburg resorts.
Agent provided travel distance between Williamsburg and Massanutten.
Caller asked how to trade via RCI and requested a person.
Agent explained RCI capability and sent an RCI help link via text.

actions.detail: Looked up account by phone and name
Sent RCI help page link via text

insights.summary: The caller wanted to find resorts in Virginia near Massanutten; the agent provided information on Williamsburg properties and sent an RCI link to facilitate an exchange.
insights.verbatim: How can I maybe trade off with one of RCI or something that's right there?
